name: Ladder Capital Corp.
description: Ladder Capital Corp. is a real estate investment trust (REIT) that focuses on commercial real estate and related investments. Established in 2013, Ladder Capital is headquartered in New York City and operates primarily in the United States. The company specializes in originating, acquiring, and managing a diversified portfolio of real estate-related assets, including mortgage loans, real estate securities, and equity investments in real estate properties. Ladder Capital is known for its expertise in the commercial mortgage sector, providing financing solutions for a variety of commercial property types, including multifamily, office, retail, and industrial properties. The company employs a disciplined investment approach, utilizing data-driven analysis to identify attractive opportunities in the real estate market. Moreover, Ladder Capital is committed to maintaining a strong balance sheet and delivering consistent returns to its shareholders through prudent capital management and strategic asset allocation. With a dedicated team of professionals and a robust investment strategy, Ladder Capital continues to navigate the complexities of the commercial real estate market, positioning itself as a trusted partner in real estate financing and investment.
headquarters: New York City, New York, USA
